channel.title: Why is Runeloc-- racist?
channel.description: Why is Rune-Loc--racists between Hamachi servers and Normal servers? both are same thing... They act like normal server is white and hamachi is black... i just got flammed a lot.. for posting MY hamachi server witch ill never get anybody to play..

item.title: Why is Runeloc-- racist?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Don’t dodge the censor.

Also, just learn to portforward and hamachi is not needed anymore anyways.

Read full topic
